dict.acceptation: 精确地；确切地；完全地，全然；恰恰；

sent.orig: Their inconvenience is exactly what we want and is exactly what is convenient for us.
sent.trans: 他们感到不方便，正是我们的目的，正是我们的方便。

sent.orig: Not exactly -- not exactly. We'll take it to my den."
sent.trans: 不行，这样不妥，我们把箱子拿到我那里去。”

sent.orig: Sometimes I would say visual communication. It is not exactly graphic design and not exactly illustration.
sent.trans: 有时候，我会说视觉沟通，他不完全是平面设计也不完全是插画。

sent.orig: It comes from knowing exactly where you are going, exactly how are going to get there.
sent.trans: 自信来自你准确知道自己去哪里，准确知道你如何到达那里。

sent.orig: Tradition calls for exactly forty pebbles and water collected from the tops of exactly forty waves.
sent.trans: 传统上要求要捡正好40块小鹅卵石和正好从40朵浪花上汲取的海水。
